description:
The RCMP intends to retain a Contractor to provide construction services for the construction of a new 26 gross square meter building at the Pacific Region Training Centre site in Chilliwack, BC.

Basis of selection:This is a two phase selection process. Bidders responding to this ITT are to submit a bid in two phases. Phase One bids cover only the qualifications and experience of the Bidders, refer to SI05 'Submission of Bid'. Following evaluation of Phase One bids, Bidders are advised of their competitive standing and responsive Phase One Bidders will be invited to submit a Phase Two bid. Phase Two bids cover the pricing. A combination of the Phase One and Phase Two submissions constitutes the final bid.
